import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './SignInUp.css' import React, { Component } from 'react' class SignInUp extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { profil: "visiteur", } } handleChangePanelLogin(event) { document.getElementById('idPanelLogin').classList.add("right-panel-active"); console.log("0"); } handleChangePanelSignUp(event) { document.getElementById('idPanelSignUp').classList.remove("right-panel-active"); console.log("1"); } render() { const {profil} = this.state return (

) } } export default SignInUp
